reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater trendy and well-made, appreciating its soft texture and rich warm red color.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So Cute and a Good Fit
items.body: Need to rotate out business sweaters for more fun casual items. This fits the bill. Size M was perfect for me. The construction was good. Nice and soft with zero itches! Really a flattering piece! Read more
items.author: Linda.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, soft, and comfy
items.body: This sweater is soft and comfy. I washed it in a garment bag and let it air dry, which worked well. It does shed some fuzzyness so be aware of what colors you wear it with. I was pleasantly surprised with it because I read some negative reviews. Mine didn't have any sewing defects and fits well (I'm 5'5", 125 lbs, I got a small). Read more
items.author: SR

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Chunky sweater for the fall/winter.
items.body: Very soft. Didn't hold shape well after washing. However, I did not put it in the dryer either b/c it def would have shrunk. Its attractive and warm. Read more
items.author: Elizabeth G

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute
items.body: I really like this sweater. It is perfect for wearing at work over a blouse or other top in case I am chilly. It looks well made and the brown color works well for my wardrobe. Read more
items.author: me13

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty but just ok
items.body: Pretty vibrant blue rather than dark navy. Many compliments. Fabric is ok. Chunky and on the short side. No pockets. I'm 42C XL. Read more
items.author: Betsy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect sweater
items.body: So pretty. I am 5’10 160 lbs and ordered a medium and it was a bit too small. I will be ordering more colors in a size large. Love it. Read more
items.author: ROSE NOCHELLA

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars It’s a 2 Tone Blue Sweater
items.body: The lapel is a different color blue and the same piece of fabric trims the whole hem of the sweater so the middle is a darker blue. Why?! Poorly made. I guess they hope you won’t mind their defect. I guess it’s more profitable to make you look like a jerk wearing it. Just wear something old and faded out in places and save your money. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super soft!
items.body: True to fit. Very soft and comfortable. Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Beau Blue, Gray, Blackish Green, Apricot Khaki, Apricot, Moss Green, Black, Navy Blue, Red, Rose Red, Apricot Powder, Khaki, Flaxen. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
